item.title: Private Transfers from Bay City Motor Inn, Victoria to Spirit of Tasmania
item.description:
Why the Spirit of Tasmania is a Key Travel Link

The Spirit of Tasmania ferry service is a vital connection between Victoria and Tasmania, offering a comfortable and scenic way to travel across Bass Strait. If you’re travelling from Bay City Motor Inn, the ferry terminal at Geelong provides convenient access to this unique journey. Whether you’re heading to Tasmania for a holiday, work, or to visit family, you’ll benefit from:
